summary: Experienced Solution Architect and System z Mainframe Technology Evangelist with over 12 years of IT industry experience focusing on large Banking & Financial Services and Government clients across the ASEAN region. Proven track record of delivering high performance and result-oriented work with exceptional management and consultative selling skills. Demonstrated ability to work independently or as a team player on various projects. Fast learner - Good analytical - Innovative - Goal-oriented - Flexible.

experience.title: Manager, Advisory, Performance Improvement
experience.description: GST implementation project in RHB Group in Malaysia.

experience.title: Client Solution Architect
experience.description: Led new solution/workload initiatives in key accounts; translated business requirements into IT solutions; oversaw delivery; specialized in enterprise modernization and integration of legacy systems and middleware (ESB, BPM, Cloud Computing, Mobility) for Financial Services and Government across ASEAN; supported demos/POCs/workshops and advised on governance and optimization.

experience.title: Core Banking Consultant
experience.description: Led technical design for ICBA core banking solution; prepared functional requirements; supported deposits/trade finance/treasury/remittances/GL modules; assisted in deployment and delivery of ICBA-based banking solutions.

experience.title: System Analyst
experience.description: Developed and maintained Core Banking system on the mainframe; specialized in Core Payment Systems (SWIFT, RENTAS, Interbank GIRO); led Foreign Bills Collection/Mobile Banking projects; team lead for Auto Payments System; performed analysis, design, coding, testing, and documentation; contributed to New Core Banking Replacement project; evaluated vendors and technologies; supported training and knowledge transfer.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (Majoring in Software Engineering)
